title: PLEASE RITO LEARN TO BALANCE FCKING GAME OR YOU WILL LOSE PLAYERS FOR SURE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
body: WHEN SOMEONE GANK THERE IS NO SUPPOST TO FARM WHOLE 2 WAVES SO FCKING BALANCE NEW AATROX THAT IS NOT CANCER ANYMORE !!!!

replies.body:
I'm sorry.

What?

What does your jungler taxing your waves have to do with the Aatrox rework?

{{sticker:sg-lux-2}}
